channel.title: xElite 317 Pk/Spawn/Eco Release!
channel.description:
Hello guys,
My server xELite 317 loads 600+ is released!
Its a awesome server with a lot of features!
Here some exsample's
Webclient Link= http://www.xelitepk.enjin.com/webclient Website Link= http://www.xelitepk.enjin.com
What is xElite and what do we strive for? xElite is a very friendly and nice community that brings Pking to a whole new level! We strive to pleasing the community and listen to they're suggestions are.
Why join xElite? Pk/Spawn/Eco Well we have many good features such as: 24/7 16 GB Ram VPS. All special attacks fully working. Nex/Nomad, Newest cape (Tokhaar Kal) Perfect switches. 100% Pk point System Flawless Pking Pking Titles (Noob Pker - 10 kills - 1337 Pker 1000 Kills) Edgeville home Bridding like no where else New runescape Interfaces 562 Gameframe Wilderness Ditch working!
- New Nex Armours + Korasi! - Fully Functioning Curse Prayers - Great Pking Community & Clans From RuneScape - Fully Working Skilling & Combat System - New Mage Book Spells Including Miasmic Spells - Bloodlust - Wilderness Targets With Rewards!
- Good Eco / Awesome Pking - Awesome switches - God Wars - Fight Caves - Fully working Bosses Including Spirit Beast, Avatar Of Destruction, Bork & many more! - Barrows (Easy Command Access) - Active, Friendly Community Forum - PK Points With Rewards such as Torva, Virtus & Much More! Hope to see you all online!
Printscreens aswell!
[size=24pt]Active Forums! At - [url=http://www.xelitepk.enjin.com]www.xelitepk.enjin.com[/url][/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cr3pf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Iha8h.png[/img] Virtus [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OE9Zs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UnDWV.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LOtz2.png[/img] Full Dicing! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Isbqw.png[/img]
2 days online
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dDeYA.png[/img]

item.title: xElite 317 Pk/Spawn/Eco Release!
item.dc:creator: @xelitepk xelitepk
item.description:
@xelitepk wrote:

Hello guys,

My server xELite 317 loads 600+ is released!

Its a awesome server with a lot of features!

Here some exsample’s

Webclient Link= http://www.xelitepk.enjin.com/webclient
Website Link= http://www.xelitepk.enjin.com

What is xElite and what do we strive for?
xElite is a very friendly and nice community that brings Pking to a whole new level! We strive to pleasing the community and listen to they’re suggestions are.

Why join xElite? Pk/Spawn/Eco
Well we have many good features such as:
24/7 16 GB Ram VPS.
All special attacks fully working.
Nex/Nomad,
Newest cape (Tokhaar Kal)
Perfect switches.
100% Pk point System
Flawless Pking
Pking Titles (Noob Pker - 10 kills - 1337 Pker 1000 Kills)
Edgeville home
Bridding like no where else
New runescape Interfaces
562 Gameframe
Wilderness Ditch working!

  • New Nex Armours + Korasi!

  • Fully Functioning Curse Prayers

  • Great Pking Community & Clans From RuneScape

  • Fully Working Skilling & Combat System

  • New Mage Book Spells Including Miasmic Spells

  • Bloodlust

  • Wilderness Targets With Rewards!

  • Good Eco / Awesome Pking

  • Awesome switches

  • God Wars

  • Fight Caves

  • Fully working Bosses Including Spirit Beast, Avatar Of Destruction, Bork & many more!

  • Barrows (Easy Command Access)

  • Active, Friendly Community Forum

  • PK Points With Rewards such as Torva, Virtus & Much More!
    Hope to see you all online!
